name: Dual Shields
description:
Dual Shields was built in Unity in 48 hours for the United Game Jam 2020.

Master the art of dual-shielding in this action-packed, block-and-bash experience! With TWO independently controlled shield-baring arms, nothing can pierce your impenetrable defense! ...not even your line of sight. 

Are you ready to defend against hordes of enemies or duel face-to-face in the arena? Well unfortunately, they aren't ready for you. But you're in luck because my buddy has a million swords he can throw at you for your training.

TWO heads is better than one, so bring a friend and engage in local split-controller multiplayer, where you split the hero in half and control their arms separately! Just like in amateur doubles tennis, you'll argue for hours over who should've been there :P.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD (left) + IJKL (right) to control the position of your steel.

Controller: Left and right joysticks (recommended method)

I had a lot of fun working on this idea, so if you have any ideas or feedback for things to add/fix/improve, please let me know!
